translation.zh: 你好 丽塔

translation.en: -Who's this? -This is an admirer.
translation.zh: 请问你是谁？ 我是你的仰慕者

translation.en: Admirer?
translation.zh: 仰慕者？

translation.en: Uh, I sent you that letter.
translation.zh: 我寄了封信给你

translation.en: What letter?
translation.zh: 什么信？

translation.en: -The one with the perfume. -[line distorts]
translation.zh: 那封有香水味的信 我没有收到

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 哈罗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 哈罗？

translation.en: -Hello? -Hello? Rita?
translation.zh: 哈罗 哈罗 丽塔

translation.en: -Hello? Are you in a station? -[trains whistling]
translation.zh: 哈罗 你在火车站吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 嗯...是的

translation.en: Are you coming... or going?
translation.zh: 你是来 还是去？

translation.en: I... I don't know.
translation.zh: 嗯...我不知道

translation.en: Hello? Did you know you're the most beautiful person on this Earth?
translation.zh: 哈罗？ 你是这个世界上最漂亮的人

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 哈罗？

translation.en: Rita, hello? I love you.
translation.zh: 哈罗？我爱你

translation.en: -Come on. -[train whistles]
translation.zh: 你跟我过来

translation.en: You made it. I was going to pull the chain.
translation.zh: 你终于来了 你做到了 我在拉拉链

translation.en: What happened to Ramu?
translation.zh: 拉姆发生了什么事？

translation.en: He didn't ask his father for permission.
translation.zh: 那笨蛋没有得到他父亲的许可就出来了

translation.en: There goes the fourth member for the quiz.
translation.zh: 那我们的第四位队员是谁？

translation.en: [man] I may be old, but I'm not dead yet.
translation.zh: 我也许老了 但我还没有死

translation.en: According to the rules of the championship,
translation.zh: 在冠军赛的规则下

translation.en: your chaperone is allowed to step into the breach.
translation.zh: 原来队员的监护人也能参与比赛

translation.en: [Naman] That's all good, then.
translation.zh: 这个真的是太好了

translation.en: Sir, can we play some music?
translation.zh: 先生 你介不介意我们开点音乐？

translation.en: -What? Can you repeat the question? -Can we play some music?
translation.zh: 什么？你能重复你的问题吗？ 可不可以开点音乐？

translation.en: If music be the food of love, play on.
translation.zh: 如果是爱情音乐的话 你就开吧

translation.en: What is this noise? The other people have complained, you know.
translation.zh: 那是什么噪音啊？ 其他的乘客在投诉你们了

translation.en: Sir, we are young. Can enjoy only once.
translation.zh: 我们是年轻人难道就不能好好享受一下吗？

translation.en: -Maintain decency. -Definitely, sir.
translation.zh: -保持你们的礼仪-我们会的

translation.en: [Naman] Padma R, F-18. Naina K, F-18.
translation.zh: 帕德玛 R F-18 奈娜 K F-18

translation.en: These F-18s can bomb my airbase anytime!
translation.zh: F-18区域的女人真的很多

translation.en: [Ajay] Rani P, F-17.
translation.zh: 拉尼P F-17

translation.en: [Randy] Augusta D, F-58.
translation.zh: 奥古斯塔 D F-58

translation.en: Unfortunately, here, if I'm not very much mistaken, are the exhibits themselves.
translation.zh: 我没看错吧？他们竟然穿成那样

translation.en: [Randy] These look one drop kick away from an arranged marriage.
translation.zh: 那种服装不是介绍对象时才会穿的吗？

translation.en: Sir, why does Madras exist, as a concept?
translation.zh: 先生 为什么要从马德拉斯出发呢？

translation.en: You know, I have a deathly relationship with Madras.
translation.zh: 我和马德拉斯有很深的渊源

translation.en: The first time I passed through the city, the chief minister died.
translation.zh: 我第一次经过这个城市时那里的首席部长死了

translation.en: The second time, the governor died.
translation.zh: 第二次经过时那里的州长死了

translation.en: This time, I hope the cursed minorities die.
translation.zh: 这一次我希望被诅咒的少数民族死亡

translation.en: [Naman] Sir, surely that's a bit bigoted.
translation.zh: 先生 那是你的偏见

translation.en: Bigoted, shigoted.
translation.zh: 即使是偏见 那又如何？

translation.en: We Brahmans are the biggest bigots and racists on this planet.
translation.zh: 我们婆罗门是严重偏见的种族主义者

translation.en: Why be ashamed of it? Revel in your supremacy, I say.
translation.zh: 但是不需要感到羞愧 这是你可以向他人展示的优势

translation.en: Quarter kilo.
translation.zh: 给我一些吧

translation.en: -Naman? -Sir?
translation.zh: -纳曼-是的

translation.en: -Dig out that gin bottle. -Huh?
translation.zh: 把酒瓶打开

translation.en: I may be old, but I'm not blind. Yet.
translation.zh: 我也许老了 可是我并不是盲的

translation.en: An old man is allowed to enjoy his drink, too.
translation.zh: 即使是老了也能开心喝酒

translation.en: Cherry in the gin is cherry on the cake.
translation.zh: 樱桃酒和蛋糕上的樱桃很像

translation.en: Are all of you in your cups?
translation.zh: 全都在你的杯子里了？

translation.en: -Cheese to the bees. -Cheers to the beers.
translation.zh: -奶酪蜜蜂-干杯啤酒

translation.en: -Diamonds are forever. -Cherries to the berries.
translation.zh: -钻石是永恒-樱桃草莓

translation.en: The aspiring chief minister is not dead yet.
translation.zh: 虽然野心满满的首席部长还活得好好的

translation.en: But that can change.
translation.zh: 但还不知道下场会如何

translation.en: She used to live down my street when she was a schoolgirl.
translation.zh: 首席部长年轻的时候曾住在我家附近

translation.en: The bitch in her green school uniform,
translation.zh: 她穿的制服是绿色的

translation.en: skirt ending just below her panties.
translation.zh: 她穿的裙子非常短连里面的内裤都露了出来

translation.en: She literally dripped as she walked along the street.
translation.zh: 她觉得很热沿着街道走 汗一直在流

translation.en: And the dogs on heat followed the bitch in heat.
translation.zh: 小狗也很热还跟在她后面一起走

translation.en: Chrysalis, I believe that's the word you were struggling for.
translation.zh: 你是说“蛹”这个词？

translation.en: [girl] Away from the parental cocoon.
translation.zh: 茧中的蛹

translation.en: Not to mention the most conservative city in the world.
translation.zh: 世界上最保守的城市是？

translation.en: -Madras. -The nympha become butterflies.
translation.zh: 马德拉斯！ 幼虫会变成蝴蝶

translation.en: Interesting that you use the word "nympha."
translation.zh: “幼虫”这词真的很有趣 如果你想说些幼稚和不修边幅的笑话

translation.en: If you're going to flog that old nymphomaniac joke, forget it.
translation.zh: 如果你想说些幼稚和不修边幅的笑话 你可以免了

translation.en: Be that as it may, whatever mania you girls subscribe to,
translation.zh: 尽管如此 姑娘们似乎对测验相对比较有说服力

translation.en: you seem to be of the quizzing persuasion.
translation.zh: 姑娘们似乎对测验相对比较有说服力

translation.en: You don't need much persuasion in a Brahman family, sir.
translation.zh: 婆罗门家庭不需要太多的说服力 只有学习 学习！

translation.en: Study, study, study. Quizzing is good for you.
translation.zh: 只有学习 学习！ 测验对你有好处

translation.en: I mean, who will marry you if you don't have at least a postgraduate degree?
translation.zh: 如果没有学位谁还会想要和你结婚？

translation.en: That is correct. Who will indeed?
translation.zh: 你说得没错 没有必要结婚吧

translation.en: -Have we seen you in Bangalore quizzes? -We've seen you.
translation.zh: 我们在班加罗尔的问答比赛见过面吗？ 我们在南区冠军见过面了

translation.en: -We were at the South Zone championship. -Which we won.
translation.zh: 我们在南区冠军见过面了 -我们那时赢得了比赛-你怎么可以这样说？

translation.en: Oh, really, how could you tell?
translation.zh: -我们那时赢得了比赛-你怎么可以这样说？

translation.en: I'm Randeep... Randy.
translation.zh: 我叫兰迪你可以叫我兰帝

translation.en: Padma. Paddy.
translation.zh: 我叫帕德玛 你可以叫我帕迪

translation.en: No predictable Irish jokes, please.
translation.zh: 就不说无趣的笑话了

translation.en: I was going for the rice theme. I'm Ajay.
translation.zh: 我想说关于大米的内容 我是阿杰

translation.en: -Rani. -Yasmin.
translation.zh: -我是拉尼-我是亚斯明

translation.en: Naina.
translation.zh: 我是尼娜

translation.en: He's Naman, our team captain.
translation.zh: 他是纳曼 我们队的组长

translation.en: I have seen Trappist monks speak more than your team captain.
translation.zh: 我见过特拉普和尚说话说得比你们队长都多

translation.en: Forget it. He's in love. With me.
translation.zh: 算了 他爱上了我 他喜欢我

translation.en: [Naman] Where was she all my wife?
translation.zh: 我的新娘在哪里呢？

translation.en: Madras.
translation.zh: 在马德拉斯呀

translation.en: You really must be in love.
translation.zh: 看来你真的是非常爱她

translation.en: What makes you say that?
translation.zh: 为什么你会这样说？

translation.en: Physical action instead of a smart verbal comeback.
translation.zh: 你的身体反应比说话快

translation.en: But what can I do?
translation.zh: 那么我该怎么办？

translation.en: Talk to her, maybe.
translation.zh: 你可以和她说说

translation.en: It's been known to work.
translation.zh: 相当有帮助的

translation.en: I'm going to try and chat with Paddy.
translation.zh: 我会试着和帕迪聊天

translation.en: -How about Rita? -Who?
translation.zh: -丽塔还好吗？-谁啊？ 1949年 女作家西蒙娜德波伏娃

translation.en: [chaperone] So, the essence of my book,
translation.zh: “女人是一种永远不会消失的痛苦” 这是我的书的精髓所在

translation.en: which I am titling Nostradamus's Inevitable Hinduism,
translation.zh: 书名是《诺查丹玛斯 不可避免的印度教》

translation.en: is that your superstar Christ was in fact sired by a Roman guard.
translation.zh: 耶稣真的父亲其实是罗马士兵

translation.en: Tiberius Iulius Abdes Pantera.
translation.zh: 一个叫约瑟本潘得拉的人

translation.en: -Centurion much higher than a god. -[woman] How quaint.
translation.zh: 他不是兵而是指挥官 真的是奇特啊

translation.en: Clearly there were traces of miscegenation in your own family tree,
translation.zh: 那么耶稣是混血的

translation.en: -hence you're out to taint Christianity. -No, no, there is proof.
translation.zh: 那是亵渎基督教 这是真的 有证据能证明的

translation.en: The Greek philosopher Celsus said so in his work Alethès Lógos.
translation.zh: 古希腊哲学家塞尔苏斯在他的书里提过

translation.en: -Which was refuted by his friend Origen-- -In his eight-volume work Contra Celsum.
translation.zh: 他的好友俄利根也翻译过... 书名为《驳塞尔苏斯》

translation.en: Naina, can I have a word with you alone?
translation.zh: 尼娜 我能单独与你说些事情吗？

translation.en: No. No mixing with boys. What would your father say?
translation.zh: 不行 我不能与男同学混在一起 到时你父亲会怎么说呢？

translation.en: Let her go, O Augusta Delphin.
translation.zh: 放我走吧 奥古斯塔德芬

translation.en: They are typical quiz boys. Harmless, gutless, feckless.
translation.zh: 除了测验 他们什么都不知道 纯真和没胆量 不负责任

translation.en: Clearly your protégés, then, Bernard Judekumar Irudayarasan.
translation.zh: 先生与学生都是一个样伯纳德先生！

translation.en: I'll have you know, Miss Augusta, that in 1968,
translation.zh: 1968年开始我就已经知道了

translation.en: when I used to come to your school, there was not a single...
translation.zh: 那时我还在上学...

translation.en: [Naina] Well, none for me?
translation.zh: 怎么样？ 你猜猜看 南方温暖的水...

translation.en: A beaker full of the warm south.
translation.zh: 你猜猜看 南方温暖的水...

translation.en: The blushful Hippocrene.
translation.zh: 羞愧的灵泉

translation.en: You know your stuff.
translation.zh: 你非常有实力

translation.en: It's a funny thing about knowledge.
translation.zh: 知识是有趣的

translation.en: It's been known for more than one person to have it.
translation.zh: 它让不止一个人可以拥有它

translation.en: -That's not what I meant. -That is exactly what you meant.
translation.zh: 我不是这样的意思 不 你就是这样的意思

translation.en: But you didn't say what you meant when you said that--
translation.zh: 你说的都不是真心话吧？

translation.en: That you were in love with me.
translation.zh: 当你说你喜欢上我的时候？

translation.en: It's painfully obvious.
translation.zh: 漏出了很多破绽

translation.en: I am good-looking, smart, female, Brahman,
translation.zh: 我是漂亮又聪明的女生 也是婆罗门

translation.en: now imbibing alcoholic libations with you.
translation.zh: 我现在和你一起喝酒

translation.en: I even speak in that funny convoluted way that quizzers seem to automatically adopt.
translation.zh: 即使我们的聊天话中有话彼此都知道话里的意思

translation.en: And if I were to ask you for that cigar, you would propose right away.
translation.zh: 如果我跟你要一支雪茄你就会马上说要和我交往

translation.en: And I'm not awed by your quiz-champ status.
translation.zh: 而且我对你的实力一点也不欣赏

translation.en: You know so much about me. How?
translation.zh: 你怎么那么了解我？

translation.en: I've seen you onstage.
translation.zh: 我很久以前就见识过了

translation.en: Admired me from afar.
translation.zh: 从那时起就仰慕我了吗？

translation.en: Seen you onstage. You are a great quizzer.
translation.zh: 我见识过你回答问题的厉害 我是有实力的

translation.en: Brahman fundamentalist, alcoholic, sexist, et cetera, et cetera.
translation.zh: 婆罗门原教旨主义 你是个酒鬼 -你有性别歧视主义 等等-谢谢

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: -你有性别歧视主义 等等-谢谢

translation.en: And only you would take that as a compliment.
translation.zh: 只有你会觉得那是称赞

translation.en: -You still haven't answered. -I still don't know what the question is.
translation.zh: 你还没有回答我的问题 我还是不知道你在问什么

translation.en: [Bernard] And what was worse, was that I lost a fortune due to termites getting into my deposit box.
translation.zh: 蚂蚁进入金库啃钱

translation.en: Sir, what happened?
translation.zh: 先生 有什么事吗？

translation.en: We're stuck at the Orissa-Bengal border.
translation.zh: 我们被困在奥里萨邦孟加拉边境

translation.en: The ruling party has called for a bandh, a general strike.
translation.zh: 听说那里发生罢工事件

translation.en: No movement for the next 12 hours.
translation.zh: 接下来的12小时都无法移动

translation.en: -And the reserve, sir? -I finished it all while you were asleep.
translation.zh: 那个预约怎么办？ 我想你们睡觉期间应该已结束了

translation.en: Miss Augusta helped.
translation.zh: 奥古斯塔小姐应该会给予协助的

translation.en: And the train has run out of food.
translation.zh: 火车上已经没有食物了

translation.en: Wake up, bastard.
translation.zh: 大家起来吧

translation.en: [Ajay] Nipple.
translation.zh: 能看见你的乳头

translation.en: [Naman] We need food.
translation.zh: 我们需要吃的食物

translation.en: Booze.
translation.zh: 还有酒

translation.en: [stammers] Train.
translation.zh: 火车...

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 停止了

translation.en: Food, food.
translation.zh: 吃的东西

translation.en: And, uh, booze, booze.
translation.zh: 然后喝的饮料

translation.en: Booze.
translation.zh: 是酒

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 对不起

translation.en: In China--
translation.zh: 在中国

translation.en: Belching is considered to be a sign of gratitude and satisfaction. I know.
translation.zh: 打嗝是一种感恩和满足的标志 我也知道

translation.en: -Always a step ahead. -Obviously.
translation.zh: 总是向前迈一步 当然啦

translation.en: Anyway, I am grateful and satisfied. Thank you for getting all this.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 我很感激你 心情也很好 非常感激

translation.en: Well, when one is described as gutless and harmless--
translation.zh: 当一个人被形容为没胆量和单纯...

translation.en: You left out feckless.
translation.zh: 你遗漏了不负责任这词

translation.en: James Joyce used the word "feck" as a synonym for stealing.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯乔伊斯把“骨干”这词 和“盗窃”这词作为同义词使用

translation.en: In A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man. Yeah.
translation.zh: 他使用于《一个青年艺术家的肖像》

translation.en: -Not bad. -For a girl?
translation.zh: 不错啊 为了个女孩？

translation.en: -No. Not bad per se. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不是 是真的很不错

translation.en: A compliment. Not grudging.
translation.zh: 这是赞美 而不是勉强的

translation.en: You were right when you said that I don't really even understand--
translation.zh: 你说得对 你不是说你喜欢我吗？

translation.en: -Naman, don't you have a girlfriend? -Yes.
translation.zh: 纳曼 你没有女朋友吗？ 我有 不 我没有

translation.en: No. Not yet.
translation.zh: 我有 不 我没有 现在还没有

translation.en: [chuckles] Either way, you're unfaithful.
translation.zh: 这样的事情你也不能够坦白

translation.en: No doubt you have some twisted Brahman justification to explain it away.
translation.zh: 你分明是想随便编个理由来打发我

translation.en: He does.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Naina, Augusta ma'am says it's bedtime.
translation.zh: 尼娜 老师说现在是睡觉时间

translation.en: -[Naman] The last song on the-- -White Album. Good night.
translation.zh: -最后一首歌...-白色专辑 晚安

translation.en: You realize who Naina is, don't you?
translation.zh: 你现在知道谁是尼娜了吧？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁啊？

translation.en: She's you, Naman.
translation.zh: 她是你

translation.en: Female Naman.
translation.zh: 女的纳曼

translation.en: So, if you fuck her...
translation.zh: 所以... 如果你和尼娜一起睡

translation.en: it'll be like fucking yourself.
translation.zh: 就好像你和自己做爱

translation.en: That makes it homo sex.
translation.zh: 那个是同性恋

translation.en: -[Brian] Good evening, everybody. -[applause]
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: How's Calcutta doing today? How's Calcutta doing today?
translation.zh: 大家在加尔各答过得好吗？ 大家在加尔各答过得好吗？

translation.en: -[cheering] -Very good.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: This year is a very special year
translation.zh: 今年是特别的一年

translation.en: because we are celebrating the 17th anniversary of quizzing in India,
translation.zh: 因为我们的问答比赛庆祝17周年纪念

translation.en: which, as you all know, began right here in Calcutta.
translation.zh: 这比赛在加尔各答开始

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Quiz Superstars.
translation.zh: 欢迎大家来到《超级巨星问答比赛》

translation.en: The biggest quiz in India, and I'm Brian D'Costa.
translation.zh: 这是印度最大的问答比赛 布瑞恩德科斯塔在这向大家问好

translation.en: -Oh, less of brain. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -傻眼了-对啊

translation.en: As usual, we have teams from all across India,
translation.zh: 这次也在印度各地举行了选拔赛

translation.en: from Delhi, Bombay, Bangalore, Madras
translation.zh: 德里 孟买 班加罗尔 马德拉斯

translation.en: and, of course, our very own kollolini Kolkata.
translation.zh: 当然在加尔各答也已进行了选拔赛！

translation.en: -[cheers and applause] -I have great news for you.
translation.zh: 我有个好消息给大家

translation.en: This year, our sponsors are not only hosting the outstation teams,
translation.zh: 我们的赞助商不仅仅是赞助我们分站的队伍

translation.en: but are also paying for the food and beverage expenses.
translation.zh: 他们还为我们准备了食物和饮料

translation.en: -What did he say? -He said drinks are on the house.
translation.zh: 他说什么？ 他们提供免费的酒

translation.en: India has a proud tradition of quizzing.
translation.zh: 传统上印度对问答比赛引以为傲

translation.en: This is because we Indians thirst for knowledge...
translation.zh: 因此印度人民渴望得到知识

translation.en: Hey. How are you? All well? Good to see you.
translation.zh: 他们享受深入探索知识 玩乐的时候也不忘炫耀一下自己的知识

translation.en: [Brian] We Indians also revel in displaying said knowledge.
